input: Create a batch request to check event specifications and modify a lock request's end date.

output.body:
--request-separator
Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary

GET /BankCardContractLockRequestEventSpecifications HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json


--request-separator
Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary

PATCH /BankCardContractLockRequests/789012 HTTP/1.1
Content-Type: application/json

{"ValidityEndDate": "2024-12-31"}


--request-separator--
